TestNG(Test Next Generation):
 - it is a unit testing tool.
 - used by both Development team to do WBT and Automation Test Engineers to do BBT.
 - It is combination of JUnit + NUnit.
 Advantages of using TestNG : 
 In TestNG we can perform
 -  batch execution
 -  Group execution
 -  parallel execution
 -  we can generate report for test execution automatically
 -  Reporter 
 -  Assertion
 -   
Rule for TestNG : 
1. classes should not created in default package
2. main() is not used 
3. System.out.print() is not used
